Manifesting as a sinuous form wreathed in sickly green flames, this incorporeal undead forms when a powerful [hag](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=59) or [witch](/Classes.aspx?ID=16) dies in agony or rage. The body at the center of the flames usually resembles the witch's idealized self-image, regardless of their age and appearance at the time of their death. A witchfire often resides in a bog or swamp, which slowly blackens and decays around them. These regions are often plagued by [will-o'-wisps](/Monsters.aspx?ID=414), which seem to have an uncanny relationship with the resident witchfire. A witchfire might visit villages on the edge of their home terrain to lure away villagers, but always attack victims within earshot to make sure that other villagers hear the screams. A witchfire might also ally with other hags or witches and even join their covens, but a witchfire is incapable of forming covens entirely on their own. **[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 28 **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 28 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 [Witchfire](/Monsters.aspx?ID=860) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 293 2.0 **Perception** +18; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +21, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19 **Str** -5 **Dex** +6 **Con** +0 **Int** +3 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +6 **[Coven](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=11)** The witchfire adds [_nightmare_](/Spells.aspx?ID=208), [_phantasmal killer_](/Spells.aspx?ID=219), [_phantasmal calamity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=218), and [_summon entity_](/Spells.aspx?ID=321) to their coven's spells. A coven can contain one or more witchfires, but it must also include at least one living creature capable of forming a coven; three witchfires cannot form a coven. --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +15 **Ref** +21 **Will** +18 **HP** 125 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), fire, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** all 10 (except force, [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297), or positive; double resistance vs. non-magical) **Opportune Witchflame** **Trigger** A creature makes a melee Strike against or touches the witchfire; **Effect** The witchfire makes a witchflame caress Strike against the triggering creature. --- **Speed** fly 40 feet **Melee** witchflame caress +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d6 fire plus 3d6 negative and witchflame **Ranged** witchflame bolt +21 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d6 fire plus 2d6 negative and witchflame **Occult Innate Spells** DC 28 - **Cantrips (5th)** [Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132) - **2nd** [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) (at will) - **3rd** [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220) - **4th** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219) - **5th** [Crushing Despair](/Spells.aspx?ID=57) - **6th** [Summon Entity](/Spells.aspx?ID=321) (will-o'-wisp only) **Witchflame** ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Any creature that takes negative damage from a witchfire's Strike must attempt a DC 26 Will save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to witchflame for 1 hour.
**Success** The creature appears to catch fire with sickly green flames. These flames deal no damage on their own, but as long as the flames burn, the creature can't be [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) ([invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) creatures are concealed rather than being [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39)) and gains weakness 5 to fire for 1 round.
**Failure** As success, but the effect is permanent until removed.
**Critical Failure** As failure, but the creature gains weakness 10 to fire. **Witchflame Kindling** ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Requirements** A creature within 30 feet of the witchfire burns with witchflame; **Effect** The witchfire's eyes and mouth glow brightly, and the witchflame on the target creature momentarily burns much hotter, dealing 5d6 fire damage and 5d6 negative damage to that creature (DC 28 basic Fortitude save). The witchfire can't use Witchflame Kindling for 1d4 rounds.
Wisps and Fire Witchfires have the ability to summon [will-o'-wisps](/Monsters.aspx?ID=414), but a number of these aberrations usually linger nearby of their own accord. The fear-inducing witchflame aura manifested by witchfires provides will-o'-wisps their favored sustenance.
